## Baseball Streak Explorer
[Streak Explorer](https://shiny.tor-gu.com/streak-explorer) 

This is an [R/Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) application that uses a novel visualization for comparing hot and cold streaks of Major League Baseball teams.

The source code is available [here](https://github.com/tor-gu/streakexplorer).

## NJ OAG Use Of Force Data Package for R
[NJOAGUOF](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoaguof/blob/main/README.md)

This data package is a cleaned-up version of the NJ OAG Use of Force dataset available from https://www.njoag.gov/force/.

## NJ OAG Law Enforcement Officer Diversity Data Package for R
[NJOAGLEOD](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoagleod#readme)

This data package is a cleaned-up version of the NJ OAG Law Enforcement Officer Diversity dataset available from https://www.njoag.gov/policerecruiting/

## NJ OAG Use Of Force Data Explorer
[NJOAGUOF Data Explorer](https://shiny.tor-gu.com/njoaguof/)

This is a simple [R/Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) dashboard application to illustrate the use of
of the [NJOAGUOF](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoaguof/blob/main/README.md) data package.  The source code is [here](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoaguofdash).
